about_the_game:
Experience the beginning of your journey in "League of Tacticians" with this demo version. In this demo, you will experience the very beginning of the full game, giving you a taste of the strategy and storytelling that awaits.

What’s Included in the Demo:

  • Story Introduction: Experience the beginning of the story-driven campaign with visual novel-style cutscenes. Learn about the main characters, their aspirations, and the challenges ahead.

  • Five Campaign Mission: Play through the opening chapter of the story-driven campaign, meeting your best friend and witnessing the humble beginnings of your rise to power.

  • Core Gameplay Features: Get a taste of the strategic gameplay, including planning your moves, completing objectives, and earning stars for tactical excellence.

  • Replayability: Experiment with different approaches to the included mission to discover alternative strategies and outcomes.

Important Notes:

  • The demo provides approximately 30-45 minutes of gameplay and represents a small slice of the full game.

  • Some features, generals, and advanced gameplay elements are not included in this demo and will be available in the full version.

short_description: League of Tacticians is a story-driven tactical game blending turn-based and real-time combat. Follow Tomyris, a young warrior, as she helps her tribe rise in the War League through strategy, skill, and determination.
